hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT EOSM.EOSM_ID, EOSM.PM_CODE, EOSM.EOSM_EBCU_PM_CODE, EOSM.EOSM_CODE, EOSM.EOSM_NAME, EOSM.EOSM_CONTACT_CODE, EOSM.EOSM_CONTACT_NAME, EOSM.EOSM_CONTACT_PHONE, EOSM.EOSM_LOCATION_CODE, EOSM.EOSM_LOCATION_NAME, EOSM.EOSM_DEFAULT_QUOTA_TYPE, EOSM.EOSM_DEFAULT_QUOTA, EOSM.EOSM_REMARK FROM EO_STORE_MANAGEMENT EOSM WHERE 1=1 <<AND EOSM.ORG_ID=:orgId>> <<AND EOSM.EOSM_EBCU_PM_CODE LIKE '%' || :eosmEbcuPmCode || '%' >> <<AND EOSM.REC_STATUS LIKE '%' || :recStatus || '%' >>
